metadata.description: The first time I laid eyes on him， everything around him vanished into thin air. He was all I could see or hear... He became my whole world. Takao Kurosaka， the school’s bad boy， falls in love with Kimihiko Yoshinaga， the school’s top student. Rumor has it that Kimihiko never denies those who approach him， but...
metadata.name: E-Series (Yaoi Manga)
